name: Classy
description: Classy is an online fundraising platform that enables nonprofits to create custom donation pages, engage with donors, and manage their fundraising efforts. Whether you're using an out-of-the-box implementation or a custom implementation, the Bytespree connector for Classy is able to download all of your Classy data.
instructions:
Classy API uses Client ID, Client Secret, and your account's Organization ID to authenticate access to its API.

  1. To find the Organization ID, please follow these steps:
    • Log in to your Classy.org account and go to the Home page.
    • Look for the web address in the address bar of your browser.
    • The organization ID is the number at the end of the URL after "org/".
    • For example, if the URL is "https://www.classy.org/admin/1234/activity", then the organization ID is "1234".
  2. Client ID and Secret
    • Go to the Apps & Extensions page from the left sidebar.
    • Click the Classy API and fill out the required fields.
      • Application name: The name of your application
      • OAuth2 redirect URL: https://orchestration.bytespree.com/OAuth/callback
    • Once you have completed the application form, click on the Create button to create your application.
    • On the next page, copy the client_id and client_secret keys.
  3. In Bytespree, provide the Organization ID, Client ID, and Client Secret you just copied.
  4. Click "Connect to Classy" in Bytespree
  5. Finish database setup
